title: White House Trump, Burt Reynolds, MTH Lebron, Colin Kaepernick, Chapman's, NFL, Pimpin', Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: White House Trump, Burt Reynolds, MTH Lebron, Colin Kaepernick, Chapman's, NFL, Pimpin', Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Happy Friday from The Steve Harvey Morning Show! It is not looking good for Trump. There is dissension in the White House. J. Anthony Brown murders another one in the spirit of Heavy D. Nike launches is Colin Kaepernick 30 year anniversary campaign. Bad Acting Theater is back. The fellas talk about the NFL and Pimpin' joins the conversation. The Closing Remarks talks about friends, loyalty and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
